reviewText: If you are starting to learn about the right brained learner then this is a great place to start.  There are several listings within the the book which helped me locate additional information which has proven very helpful for one of my struggling readers.

I was looking for ways to help my son who was struggling in school, and I came across Diane's dvd. I have since shared it with his school psychologist, and his intervention teachers, and they rave about her techniques! Thank you, Diane!
